description: This file is a C/C++ header defining functions for XML DOM tree creation used in data model packing within a code-generated system. It provides function prototypes for creating XML nodes and parameters for XML document construction.

methods.name: DMPackCreateObject
methods.description: Creates an XML DOM node object of a specified type and name.

methods.name: DMPackCreateFunctions
methods.description: Creates multiple functions on a given XML DOM node.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParam
methods.description: Creates a parameter node with a specified type ID.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTSWN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type, S, W, N attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTSW
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type, S, W attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTSN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type, S, N attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTS
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type and S attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTWN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type, W, N attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTW
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type and W attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamTN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with type and N attributes.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamSWN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with S, W, N attributes and a type ID.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamSW
methods.description: Creates a parameter with S, W attributes and a type ID.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamSN
methods.description: Creates a parameter with S, N attributes and a type ID.

methods.name: DMPackCreateParamS
methods.description: Creates a parameter with S attribute and a type ID.

methods.name: DMPackCreateW
methods.description: Creates a node with a name, type ID, and W attribute.

methods.name: DMPackCreateN
methods.description: Creates a node with a name, type ID, and N attribute.

methods.name: DMPackCreateNode
methods.description: Creates an XML node with specified name, text, and size.

methods.name: DMPackCreatePNode
methods.description: Creates a parent XML node with a specified name.
